verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, And God אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying ס sa-Mek

אָֽנֹכִ֖י֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tze-Ti-cha which have brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz thee out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt מִבֵּ֣֥ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit out of the house עֲבָדִֽ֑ים׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

לֹֽ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יִהְיֶֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- shall have לְךָ֛֩ le-Cha אֱלֹהִ֥֨ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֖֜ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim Thou shalt have no other עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- before פָּנָֽ֗יַ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Na-ya, before me

לֹֽ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תַֽעֲשֶׂ֨ה־ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh- Thou shalt not make לְךָ֥֣ le-Cha פֶ֣֙סֶל֙׀ <S%H6459><s%> fe-sel unto thee any graven image וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol any תְּמוּנָ֡֔ה <S%H8544><s%> te-mu-Nah, or any likeness אֲשֶׁ֤֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher [of any thing] that בַּשָּׁמַ֣֙יִם֙׀ <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim [is] in heaven מִמַּ֡֔עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al, above וַֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר֩ <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher of what בָּאָ֖֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz or that [is] in the earth מִתַָּ֑֜חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat beneath וַאֲשֶׁ֥֣ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher of what בַּמַּ֖֣יִם׀ <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim beneath or that [is] in the water מִתַּ֥֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat under לָאָֽ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz, under the earth

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִשְׁתַּחְוֶ֥֣ה <S%H7812><s%> tish-tach-Veh Thou shalt not bow down לָהֶ֖ם֮ la-Hem וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or תָעָבְדֵ֑ם֒ <S%H5647><s%> ta-'a-ve-Dem thyself to them nor serve כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָֽנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh them for I the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God קַנָּ֔א <S%H7067><s%> kan-Na, [am] a jealous פֹּ֠קֵד <S%H6485><s%> Po-ked visiting עֲוֹ֨ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity אָבֹ֧ת <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vot of the fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim upon the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שִׁלֵּשִׁ֥ים <S%H8029><s%> shil-le-Shim unto the third וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and רִבֵּעִ֖ים <S%H7256><s%> rib-be-'Im and fourth לְשֹׂנְאָֽ֑י׃ <S%H8130><s%> le-so-ne-'Ai. [generation] of them that hate

וְעֹ֥֤שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'O-seh And shewing חֶ֖֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> che-sed mercy לַאֲלָפִ֑֔ים <S%H505><s%> la-'a-la-Fim, unto thousands לְאֹהֲבַ֖י <S%H157><s%> le-'o-ha-Vai of them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> u-le-sho-me-Rei me and keep מִצְוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tai. my commandments ס sa-Mek

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִשָּׂ֛א <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa Thou shalt not take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לַשָּׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> lash-Shav; in vain כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יְנַקֶּה֙ <S%H5352><s%> ye-nak-Keh will not hold him guiltless יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, for the LORD אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa that taketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name לַשָּֽׁוְא׃ <S%H7723><s%> lash-Shav. in vain פ Peh

זָכ֛וֹר֩ <S%H2142><s%> za-Chor Remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- י֥֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day הַשַּׁבָּ֖֜ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat the sabbath לְקַדְּשֽׁ֗וֹ <S%H6942><s%> le-kad-de-Sho, to keep it holy

שֵׁ֤֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> She-shet Six יָמִ֣ים֙ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days תַּֽעֲבֹ֔ד֮ <S%H5647><s%> ta-'a-Vod shalt thou labour וְעָשִׂ֖֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and do כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מְלַאכְתֶּֽךָ֒ <S%H4399><s%> me-lach-te-Cha all thy work

וְי֙וֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> ve-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔֜י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I But the seventh שַׁבָּ֖֣ת׀ <S%H7676><s%> shab-Bat [is] the sabbath לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לֹֽ֣א־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣֨ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh [in it] thou shalt not do כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol any מְלָאכָ֡֜ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah any work אַתָּ֣ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָֽ֣־ <S%H1121><s%> u-vin-cha- thou nor thy son וּ֠בִתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H1323><s%> u-vit-Te-cha, nor thy daughter עַבְדְּךָ֤֨ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-de-Cha thy manservant וַאֲמָֽתְךָ֜֙ <S%H519><s%> va-'a-ma-te-Cha nor thy maidservant וּבְהֶמְתֶּ֔֗ךָ <S%H929><s%> u-ve-hem-Te-cha, nor thy cattle וְגֵרְךָ֖֙ <S%H1616><s%> ve-ge-re-Cha nor thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֥֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Rei-cha, that [is] within thy gates

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki in שֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <S%H8337><s%> she-shet- For [in] six יָמִים֩ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, and earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam the sea וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after בָּ֔ם Bam, וַיָּ֖נַח <S%H5117><s%> vai-Ya-nach and all that in them [is] and rested בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֑י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I; the seventh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that בֵּרַ֧ךְ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh wherefore the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day הַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat the sabbath וַֽיְקַדְּשֵֽׁהוּ׃ <S%H6942><s%> Vay-kad-de-She-hu. and hallowed ס sa-Mek

כַּבֵּ֥ד <S%H3513><s%> kab-Bed Honour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אִמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Me-cha; and thy mother לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of יַאֲרִכ֣וּן <S%H748><s%> ya-'a-ri-Chun may be long יָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mei-cha, that thy days עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, upon the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָֽךְ׃ Lach. ס sa-Mek
לֹ֥֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִּֿרְצָֽ֖ח׃ <S%H7523><s%> tre-Tzach. Thou shalt not kill ס sa-Mek
לֹ֣֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִּֿנְאָֽ֑ף׃ <S%H5003><s%> tne-'Af. Thou shalt not commit adultery ס sa-Mek
לֹ֣֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִּֿגְנֹֽ֔ב׃ <S%H1589><s%> tge-No. Thou shalt not steal ס sa-Mek

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> ta-'a-Neh Thou shalt not bear בְרֵעֲךָ֖ <S%H7453><s%> ve-re-'a-Cha against thy neighbour עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> 'ed witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. false. ס sa-Mek

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תַחְמֹ֖ד <S%H2530><s%> tach-Mod Thou shalt not covet בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-cha; thy neighbour's לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תַחְמֹ֞ד <S%H2530><s%> tach-Mod thou shalt not covet אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife רֵעֶ֗ךָ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-cha, thy neighbour's וְעַבְדּ֤וֹ <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-Do nor his manservant וַאֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H519><s%> va-'a-ma-To nor his maidservant וְשׁוֹר֣וֹ <S%H7794><s%> ve-sho-Ro nor his ox וַחֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-mo-Ro, nor his ass וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol anything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that לְרֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-cha. nor any thing that [is] thy neighbour's פ Peh

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol All הָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people רֹאִ֨ים <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Im saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקּוֹלֹ֜ת <S%H6963><s%> hak-ko-Lot the thunderings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַלַּפִּידִ֗ם <S%H3940><s%> hal-lap-pi-Dim, and the lightnings וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol and the noise הַשֹּׁפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> hash-sho-Far, of the trumpet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har and the mountain עָשֵׁ֑ן <S%H6226><s%> 'a-Shen; smoking וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and when the people וַיָּנֻ֔עוּ <S%H5128><s%> vai-ya-Nu-'u, [it] they removed וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'am-Du and stood מֵֽרָחֹֽק׃ <S%H7350><s%> Me-ra-Chok. afar off

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses דַּבֵּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dab-ber- Speak אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah yourself עִמָּ֖נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu and we וְנִשְׁמָ֑עָה <S%H8085><s%> ve-nish-Ma-'ah; thou with us and we will hear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nay יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber speak עִמָּ֛נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him but let not God פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or נָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> na-Mut. with us lest we die

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָאוּ֒ <S%H3372><s%> ti-ra-'U Fear כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, in לְבַֽעֲבוּר֙ <S%H5668><s%> le-va-'a-Vur to נַסּ֣וֹת <S%H5254><s%> nas-Sot prove אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba is come הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; not for God וּבַעֲב֗וּר <S%H5668><s%> u-va-'a-Vur, order תִּהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become יִרְאָת֛וֹ <S%H3374><s%> yir-'a-To you and that his fear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- may be before פְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Chem may be before your faces לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti you may not תֶחֱטָֽאוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> te-che-Ta-'u. that ye sin

וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod stood הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people מֵרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok; afar off וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh and Moses נִגַּ֣שׁ <S%H5066><s%> nig-Gash drew near אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָֽעֲרָפֶ֔ל <S%H6205><s%> ha-'a-ra-Fel, unto the thick darkness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. where God פ Peh
